ideas.title: The Puzzle Box
ideas.description: A single-room puzzle game where players must solve increasingly complex logic puzzles to escape. Each puzzle builds upon the previous one, teaching players new mechanics as they progress.
ideas.developmentTips: Start with simple on/off switches and gradually introduce more complex logic. Use clear visual feedback for puzzle states. Keep the scope small but make each puzzle satisfying to solve.

ideas.title: The Detective's Office
ideas.description: A mystery game where players investigate cases from a detective's office. Players examine evidence, interview witnesses, and piece together clues to solve crimes. Each case teaches new investigation techniques.
ideas.developmentTips: Focus on creating compelling mysteries with multiple possible solutions. Use clear visual feedback for evidence examination. Keep the interface simple but informative.

ideas.title: The Arcade Defender
ideas.description: A retro-style arcade game where players defend a base from waves of enemies. Players can upgrade their defenses between waves and must manage resources to survive increasingly difficult attacks.
ideas.developmentTips: Keep the action fast-paced but manageable. Use clear visual feedback for damage and upgrades. Balance difficulty progression to maintain engagement.

ideas.title: The Haunted House
ideas.description: A simple horror experience where players explore a haunted house to find a missing item. Players must navigate through dark rooms, avoid jump scares, and solve basic puzzles to escape. Perfect for learning horror game basics.
ideas.developmentTips: Start with a small, linear layout. Use lighting to create atmosphere and guide players. Keep puzzles simple and focus on creating tension through sound and lighting.

ideas.title: The Dark Corridor
ideas.description: A minimalist horror game where players must navigate through a series of dark corridors to reach the exit. Players have limited visibility and must rely on sound cues to avoid danger and find their way.
ideas.developmentTips: Focus on creating atmosphere through sound design. Use lighting to create safe zones and guide players. Keep the scope small but impactful.

ideas.title: The Escape Room
ideas.description: A classic escape room experience where players must solve a series of interconnected puzzles to escape from a locked room. Each puzzle reveals clues for the next, creating a satisfying progression.
ideas.developmentTips: Create clear visual feedback for all interactions. Use color coding and symbols to help players understand puzzle connections. Test the difficulty curve carefully.

ideas.title: The Treasure Hunt
ideas.description: A simple adventure where players explore an environment to find hidden treasures. Players must solve basic puzzles, avoid simple obstacles, and collect items to complete their quest.
ideas.developmentTips: Use clear visual cues to guide players to objectives. Create satisfying feedback for successful collections. Keep the environment manageable in size.

ideas.title: The Light Switch
ideas.description: A simple puzzle game where players must turn on all the lights in a building by solving logic puzzles. Each room presents a different challenge that teaches basic puzzle-solving concepts.
ideas.developmentTips: Start with very simple puzzles and gradually increase complexity. Use clear visual feedback to show puzzle states. Focus on teaching one concept at a time.

ideas.title: The Color Matching Game
ideas.description: A simple puzzle game where players must match colored objects to solve challenges. Players learn basic color theory and pattern recognition while solving increasingly complex matching puzzles.
ideas.developmentTips: Use bright, distinct colors that are easy to distinguish. Create clear visual feedback for successful matches. Start with simple 2-color matches and gradually increase complexity.

ideas.title: The Sound Explorer
ideas.description: A gentle exploration game where players navigate by following different sounds. Players must identify and follow audio cues to discover hidden areas and collect peaceful ambient sounds.
ideas.developmentTips: Focus on creating a calming, non-threatening atmosphere. Use gentle sounds and soft lighting. Make the experience relaxing rather than challenging.

ideas.title: The Button Factory
ideas.description: A simple factory simulation where players press buttons in the correct sequence to create products. Each level introduces new button combinations and timing challenges.
ideas.developmentTips: Use clear visual cues to show button states. Create satisfying feedback for correct sequences. Keep timing windows generous for beginners.

ideas.title: The Friendly Garden
ideas.description: A peaceful gardening game where players explore a small garden, water plants, and watch them grow. Players learn about simple plant care and enjoy a relaxing outdoor experience.
ideas.developmentTips: Create a warm, inviting atmosphere with soft lighting and gentle colors. Make plant growth satisfying to watch. Focus on relaxation over challenge.

ideas.title: The Shape Sorter
ideas.description: A classic shape-matching game where players must fit different shaped objects into corresponding holes. Players develop spatial awareness and problem-solving skills.
ideas.developmentTips: Use clear, distinct shapes that are easy to identify. Provide immediate visual feedback for correct matches. Start with simple shapes and gradually introduce more complex ones.

ideas.title: The Night Watchman
ideas.description: A very gentle horror game where players patrol a small building at night, turning on lights to keep the darkness at bay. Players learn about light mechanics in a non-threatening environment.
ideas.developmentTips: Keep the horror elements very mild - focus on atmosphere rather than scares. Use lighting to create safe zones. Make the experience more cozy than frightening.

ideas.title: The Memory Game
ideas.description: A classic memory matching game where players must remember the locations of hidden objects. Players develop memory skills while enjoying simple, satisfying gameplay.
ideas.developmentTips: Use clear, distinct objects that are easy to remember. Provide satisfying feedback for matches. Start with small grids and gradually increase size.

ideas.title: The Weather Station
ideas.description: A simple weather observation game where players monitor and record different weather conditions. Players learn about weather patterns while enjoying a peaceful outdoor setting.
ideas.developmentTips: Create a peaceful, educational atmosphere. Use gentle weather effects that aren't overwhelming. Focus on learning and observation rather than challenge.

ideas.title: The Music Box
ideas.description: A musical puzzle game where players must recreate simple melodies by pressing buttons in the correct order. Players develop musical memory and pattern recognition skills.
ideas.developmentTips: Use simple, memorable melodies. Provide clear visual and audio feedback. Start with short sequences and gradually increase length.

ideas.title: The Pet Care Simulator
ideas.description: A gentle pet care game where players look after a virtual pet by feeding, playing, and caring for it. Players learn responsibility and empathy through simple care mechanics.
ideas.developmentTips: Create a warm, caring atmosphere. Make the pet responsive and lovable. Focus on positive reinforcement and gentle care activities.

ideas.title: The Code Cracker
ideas.description: A beginner-friendly horror game where players interact with simple systems to develop basic gameplay skills. Focus is on learning, fun, and accessibility.
ideas.developmentTips: Keep the concept focused and manageable. Use clear feedback to guide the player. Design each level to teach one new thing.

ideas.title: The Maze Runner
ideas.description: A beginner-friendly educational game where players interact with simple systems to develop basic gameplay skills. Focus is on learning, fun, and accessibility.
ideas.developmentTips: Keep the concept focused and manageable. Use clear feedback to guide the player. Design each level to teach one new thing.
